## Introduction

## Hello World

```{r}
print("Hello R World!")
```

## Variable Values

```{r}
x=1
print(x)
```

In the next code chunk we increment x:

```{r}
x=x+1
print(x)
```

## Inline code evaluation

The value of x is `r x`!
